headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Marathon Petroleum (MPC): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Marathon Petroleum (MPC) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Oil Swings on Venezuela Supply Outlook, US Tanker Seizure
summary: Crude had earlier dropped after President Donald Trump said Venezuela’s interim authorities agreed to give up as many as 50 million barrels of “High Quality, Sanctioned Oil” to the US.  CNBC said some sanctions on Venezuela would be lifted, reinforcing the chances of uninterrupted flows.  “We’re going to let the oil flow,” Energy Secretary Chris Wright said at the Goldman Sachs Energy Conference, referring to Venezuelan output.

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Expanding Venezuelan Crude Runs Ahead of Earnings
summary: Marathon Petroleum recently announced it will host a conference call on February 3, 2026, to review its 2025 fourth‑quarter and full‑year financial results, with materials and a replay made available on its website. At the same time, the company’s large Garyville refinery in Louisiana is positioned to process more Venezuelan heavy crude, underpinned by strong recent refining margins and high utilization rates. We’ll now examine how Marathon’s ability to capture additional Venezuelan heavy...
